document.full_text: while barry bonds's personal trainer is willing to go to jail to protect his client, the trainer for rogers clemens is expected to be the star witness against him.
document.title: sports of the times: at the witness stand, two parallel paths diverge
lines_and_colors: while barry bonds's personal trainer is willing to go to jail to protect his client, the trainer for rogers clemens is expected to be the star witness against him.
